page.title: 11LIFE STYLES 1
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DEONNE TANNER(11) The radio comes on at precisely 0700. The song which is playing is Duran Duran's "View to a Kill."I give myself ten minutes to wake up and then I get dressed. I go to the bathroom to wash and clean my teeth and then I have my breakfast. I usually have cereal.After breakfast I pack my bag and put in my lunch: sandwiches, crisps, chocolate biscuits and a drink.I kiss my parents goodbye and go next door for my friend Joanne.As I ring the bell, Lucky, Lady and Snoopy, her pups, come rushing to the door. Jacqueline, Joanne's sister, answers and calls Joanne. Once at school, we start KMP which is a maths project. At 1520 I go home for dinner and at 1800 it is time to go to gymnastics with my friend, Kellie. We go home at 2000 and I wash for bed.
